fields.title: Distribution
fields.description: Parameters controlling the initial scatter of the feature.

subForm.title: Distribution
subForm.description: Controls the scatter distribution of features during world generation.

fields.title: Iterations
fields.description: Number of scattered positions to generate. Can be an integer or a Molang expression.

fields.title: Scatter Chance
fields.description: Probability that this scatter will occur (0.0 to 1.0 or Molang expression). If not triggered, no iterations will run.

fields.title: Coordinate Evaluation Order
fields.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. Defaults to 'xzy'.

fields.title: X Distribution
fields.description: Distribution for the X coordinate (evaluated each iteration). Can be an integer, range object, or Molang expression.

fields.title: Y Distribution
fields.description: Distribution for the Y coordinate (evaluated each iteration). Can be an integer, range object, or Molang expression.

fields.title: Z Distribution
fields.description: Distribution for the Z coordinate (evaluated each iteration). Can be an integer, range object, or Molang expression.

fields.title: description
fields.description: Identifier for the Feature Rule and Feture to place.

fields.title: conditions
fields.description: Parameters to control where and when the feature will be placed.

fields.title: distribution
fields.description: Parameters controlling the initial scatter of the feature.

subForm.title: Distribution
subForm.description: Controls the scatter distribution of a particular object.

fields.title: z
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

subForm.title: Z
subForm.description: Represents the scatter distrubution over a coordinate (x/y/z), can also be built by an expression.

fields.title: iterations
fields.description: Number of scattered positions to generate.

fields.title: scatter_chance
fields.description: Probability that this scatter will occur. Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.

subForm.title: Scatter Chance
subForm.description: Scatter probability represented by an expression or an object with a numerator and denominator.

fields.title: Coordinate Evaluation Order
fields.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. If omitted, defaults to "xzy". Supported orders are defined by "Coordinate Evaluation Order".

fields.title: x
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

subForm.title: X
subForm.description: Represents the scatter distrubution over a coordinate (x/y/z), can also be built by an expression.

fields.title: y
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

subForm.description: Represents the scatter distrubution over a coordinate (x/y/z), can also be built by an expression.
